alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 2:51AM CDT until June 05 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Reno County in south central Kansas... Kingman County in south central Kansas... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 251 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Abbyville to near Cunningham to 5 miles south of Cullison, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingman, Pretty Prairie, Norwich, Arlington, Cunningham, Turon, Partridge, Sylvia, Plevna, Abbyville, Nashville, Murdock, Waterloo, Willowdale, Zenda, Spivey, Langdon, Cleveland, Penalosa and Mt Vernon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
